actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Office of Senate Fair Employment Practices in Betty Johnson v. Office of Senate Fair Employment Practices, No. 94-6002 (Fed. Cir.).
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Office of Senate Fair Employment Practices in the case of Betty Johnson v. Office of Senate Fair Employment Practices.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Office of Senate Fair Employment Practices in Betty Johnson v. Office of Senate Fair Employment Practices, No. 94-6002 (Fed. Cir.).
